Posts.Content: My favorite color has always been blue.All shades of blue.
Posts.Title: I thought it would be great to see what your favorite color is, so, what is your favorite color?

Posts.Content: I received my Christmas ornament. It's the prettiest angel doll all dressed up in her finery for the Holidays.Thank you Double Whammy.
Posts.Title: Christmas Ornament

Posts.Content: I can relate to this. I go to bed between 8:30 and 9 PM, more often then not I'm wide awake at 2 AM. Before I started chemo I would have bouts of insomnia, but now this is the norm for me. I get up between 4 and 5 AM to be at work for 6:30. Like you I hate the idea of a sleeping pill.
Posts.Title: Up all Night

Posts.Content: At my next to last chemo treatment yesterday (YAY!!), I mentioned to the doctor about the troubles sleeping. Suggested the Benadryl. Used it last night and had the best sleep in months. I hope this info helps someone else find a way to get a restful night sleep. Linda
Posts.Title: Up all Night
